name: Research Software Engineering with Python  Course
description: This course provides an overview of key skills for Research Software Engineers, including software design, version control with Git, testing with pytest, and project management.
author: The Alan Turing Institute
dependsOn:
10, 11, 16, 17, 23, 48 - This is a python based course
9, 13
35, 37
learningObjectives: Course is very long. Like that it includes differnet types of programs for use.  It is modular.   Covers much of what th eother cousres do.
abstract: This course provides training for Research Software Engineers (RSEs), covering best practices in software development, version control, testing, and project management for research software.
audience: Research Software Engineers, Researchers, Software Developers
competencyRequired: Basic understanding of research software development
mentions: GitHub, https://github.com, A platform for hosting and sharing research code
teaches: The student will be able to apply software development best practices, use version control, write tests, and manage research software projects.
